entry.title: Make your Kafka bus more robust with Apache Avro & Confluent Schema Registry

entry.title: How to plug your Umbrel's Nextcloud into the official Nextcloud mobile app?
entry.summary: Why you could want to do that? You could want to use the Nextcloud app to make saving your phone data easier or to get documents from your cloud easily (without a Tor browser, connect via onion etc.).
